meanings.definition: Of or relating to the trapezium bone in the wrist.
meanings.sent1: The trapezial bone helps with wrist movement.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sharp pain in her trapezial wrist bone.
meanings.sent3: The trapezial bone decided to take a break from all the wrist action.
meanings.sent4: Her trapezial bone was as sturdy as a rock, supporting her every move.
meanings.sent5: The trapezial bone, like a loyal friend, never failed her in times of need.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the trapezius muscle in the back.
meanings.sent1: His trapezial muscles were sore after the workout.
meanings.sent2: The trapezial muscle helps with shoulder movement.
meanings.sent3: The trapezial muscle joked that it was carrying the weight of the world on its back.
meanings.sent4: Her trapezial muscles were like steel cables, supporting her posture.
meanings.sent5: The trapezial muscle, a silent hero, kept her back straight and strong.
